ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
1 pound fresh large shrimp, deveined with shells on

cookingTips: Keep shrimp shells on for enhanced flavor and texture protection
Vinegar in the steaming liquid enhances the seafood flavor
Shrimp are done when they turn pink and opaque, typically 4-5 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Steaming is a healthy cooking method that preserves shrimp delicacy. Help the cook understand how the aromatic steaming liquid infuses the Old Bay seasoning directly into the meat.
